title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package enabling Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; chat, pull, delete, show.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, Next.js chat, Discord bot, Function-calling, GPU offloading, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API; static binary generation for embedded deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate exposing typed chat, embeddings and model management via reqwest.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module for reproducible CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single docker-compose.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC service wrapper around Ollama REST API for high-throughput internal micro-services.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers threads using local Ollama models with per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping the Ollama API; integrates with Windows Terminal and PSReadLine.

title: ollama-mistral-insight
summary: Fine-tune Mistral 7B on Ollama with QLoRA and share quantized GGUF back to the community.
